import React, { useState } from 'react' import './sign.css' const Sign = () => { const [saveuser ,setsaveuser]=useState('') const [savepassward,setsaveppassward]=useState('') function handlechannge(event){ event.preventDefault(); } const obj={username,passward} const stored=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userdata'))||[] function save(){ handlechannge() } return (
@
) } export default Sign
